ExCnt.EX: It's okay going there, but a) it's gotta be a Friday and b) You gotta know your way around the night bus system AND the streets in Eastenders, I mean the Eastend ... Okay, so something amusing did happen, and woke us up, while it left the guys majorly embarassed.
Forced to grow up fast, he has established himself as a majorly cool crime lord while still in his teens.
